section.name: Introduction
section.p: At any time, all the code in SVN should be compilable and should pass all the unit tests. There is no guarantee that it will be full featured - this is a work in progress.

section.name: Latest build
section.p: You can download the latest build from our Cruise Control server kindly hosted by Canoo AG.

section.name: Checking out SVN repository
section.p: Another way to get the latest code is through SVN. Create a directory for HtmlUnit (for instance c:\htmlunit or ~/htmlunit). Change to that directory and execute the following commands.
